roadweaver.midnightconfig.initialLocatin: Number of structures to locate on world load
Select the number of structures to locate on world load. Higher number = longer loading time
roadweaver.midnightconfig.structureToLoc: Select or type the structure you want to locate. E.g., #minecraft:village, minecraft:village_plains or modid:custom_structure. Allows structure tags and keys.
roadweaver.midnightconfig.structureSearc: Search radius for structures (in chunks). Higher value = wider search area but slower. Default: 100 (1600 blocks)
roadweaver.midnightconfig.averagingRadiu: Amount of terrain averaging done for artificial roads
roadweaver.midnightconfig.allowArtificia: Whether artificial roads are allowed to generate
roadweaver.midnightconfig.allowNatural.t: Whether natural roads are allowed to generate
roadweaver.midnightconfig.placeWaypoints: Disables road generation in favor of waypoint generation
roadweaver.midnightconfig.placeRoadFence: Generate intermittent fence decorations along roads for enhanced visual appeal
roadweaver.midnightconfig.placeSwings.to: Generate swing decorations at suitable locations to add playfulness to roads
roadweaver.midnightconfig.placeBenches.t: Generate bench decorations along roads to provide resting spots
roadweaver.midnightconfig.placeGloriette: Generate gloriette decorations along roads to enhance road scenery
roadweaver.midnightconfig.structureDista: Distance in blocks between large decorative structures and road center. Higher values place structures farther from roads. Default: 4
roadweaver.midnightconfig.maxHeightDiffe: Maximum height difference allowed for roads. Higher values allow steeper roads. Default: 5
roadweaver.midnightconfig.maxTerrainStab: Terrain stability threshold. Higher values allow rougher terrain. Default: 4
roadweaver.midnightconfig.maxConcurrentR: Maximum number of roads that can be generated simultaneously. Lower values reduce performance impact but slow down road generation. Default: 3
roadweaver.midnightconfig.title: RoadWeaver
gui.roadweaver.debug_map.title: RoadWeaver - Debug Map
config.roadweaver.title: RoadWeaver Configuration
config.roadweaver.structureToLocate.tool: Select or type the structure you want to locate. E.g., #minecraft:village (village tag), minecraft:village_plains (plains village) or modid:custom_structure (mod structure). Supports structure tags and keys.
Search radius for structures (in chunks). Higher value = wider search area but slower. Default: 100 (1600 blocks)
config.roadweaver.initialLocatingCount.t: Number of structures to locate on world load. Higher number = longer loading time
config.roadweaver.maxConcurrentRoadGener: Maximum number of roads that can be generated simultaneously. Lower values reduce performance impact but slow down road generation. Default: 3
config.roadweaver.averagingRadius.toolti: Amount of terrain averaging done for artificial roads. Higher values = smoother but less natural. Default: 1
config.roadweaver.allowArtificial.toolti: Whether artificial roads (stone bricks, slabs, etc.) are allowed to generate
config.roadweaver.allowNatural.tooltip: Whether natural roads (dirt, gravel, etc.) are allowed to generate
config.roadweaver.structureDistanceFromR: Distance in blocks between large decorative structures and road center. Higher values place structures farther from roads. Default: 4
config.roadweaver.maxHeightDifference.to: Maximum height difference allowed for roads. Higher values allow steeper roads. Default: 5
config.roadweaver.maxTerrainStability.to: Terrain stability threshold. Higher values allow rougher terrain. Default: 4
config.roadweaver.placeWaypoints.tooltip: Disables road generation in favor of waypoint generation (for testing and debugging)
config.roadweaver.placeRoadFences.toolti: Generate intermittent fence decorations along roads for enhanced visual appeal
config.roadweaver.placeSwings.tooltip: Generate swing decorations at suitable locations to add playfulness to roads
config.roadweaver.placeBenches.tooltip: Generate bench decorations along roads to provide resting spots
config.roadweaver.placeGloriettes.toolti: Generate gloriette decorations along roads to enhance road scenery
